item.title: Hardware knowledge: how to choose a hard drive
item.description: When buying a computer hard drive, there are still many pitfalls, collated some of the content previously seen, combined with their own buying experience to do some sorting. There are two main options for picking a storage device: SDD (solid state drive) and HDD (mechanical hard drive), and for some people who don’t know much about them, the difference between the two may be that SSDs are more expensive with higher performance.
